name: The story of Bill Bear
description:
The story of Bill Bear is a visual novel with platformer elements, in which you have to help a lost teddy bear to return to its young owner.
Adventures, dangers, and new friends are waiting for the hero on such a long, for his little paws, way home.



In this game you are waiting for:
  • gameplay that combines the mechanics of a platformer and a visual novel
  • unexpected plot twists
  • charming characters
  • a touching story
If you cried at Toy Story, then before you sit down for Little Bear, we advise you to stock up on handkerchiefs in advance!
